EmailTemplate.name: 202008_Americas_ATR_Air-and-Thermal_On24_Webinar.Thank you for attending!
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining us!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for attending our webinar! Hello {{lead.First Name:default=customer}},
Thank you for attending our webinar.
This webcast is now on-demand <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/33R1CvTQQEWy5HDZWvTxZR]]>, should you like to view it again. Please use code 082620.
We also want you to have access to the slide deck from our presentation—it is available for download here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Air%26Thermal826WebinarDeck.pptx]]>.
Stay in the loop with us and you’ll be among the first to learn about upcoming webinars, events, product launches and more! Sign up here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>.
We look forward to seeing you again.
Thank you, Honeywell Aerospace WATCH NOW <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/33R1CvTQQEWy5HDZWvTxZR]]>
